name: Moltke
description:
GMTK 2020 Jam submission

"No plan survives contact with the enemy"
- Moltke the Elder (paraphrased)

Missing some stuff (of course, it's a game jam). Most importantly: don't expect a victory or loss screen, there isn't one :/

Code (obviously excluding the Unity runtime) by me.
Art by me.
Silence (there isn't any audio) by me.
